document.text:
From: 
To: "Strauss, Audrey (USANYS)" 
Subject: FW: GM Press Materials 
Date: Sun, 28 Jun 2020 00:19:03 +0000 
Attachments: Ghislaine Maxwell_Press_Remarks_v3_(ig_edits).docx 
I have some thoughts and edits on the draft remarks for your consideration in the attached version. As you'll see, they're 
principally geared toward simplifying some of the language and shortening sentences. Thanks. 
From: Strauss, Audrey (USANYS) 
Sent: Saturda , June 27, 2020 8:39 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: GM Press Materials 
Many thanks. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jun 26, 2020, at 6:45 PM, Nrote: 
Audrey â€”  We've put together some draft remarks and a Q&A for a potential press conference next week. The team is 
also working with the press office to put together a visual. Happy to discuss further after you've had a chance to review. 
Thanks, 
<Ghislaine Maxwell Press Remarks v3.docx> 
<Maxwell possible QA v2.docx> 
EFTA00015691
